Alias.name: lead mount
Alias.script: send("lead "..my.mount, false)

Alias.name: mount
Alias.script: if can.vault then send("vault "..my.mount, false) else send("mount "..my.mount, false) end

Alias.name: dismount
Alias.script: send("dismount", false)

Alias.name: punch mount
Alias.script: set_attack("punch "..my.mount..";stop")

Alias.name: unwield
Alias.script: unwielding = true tempTimer(1, [[unwielding = false]]) send(matches[1], false)

Alias.name: get
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: put
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: probe
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then do_pack(matches[1]) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: open
Alias.script: if matches[2] == my.container then opening = true send(matches[1], false) tempTimer(1, [[opening = false]]) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: remove
Alias.script: if matches[3] == my.container then removing = true send(matches[1], false) tempTimer(1, [[removing = false]]) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: start bashing
Alias.script: toggles.bashing = true cecho("<green>Bashing ON!") send(" ") waiting.ih = false do_bashing()

Alias.name: stop bashing
Alias.script: toggles.bashing = false inquartata = false cecho("<green>Bashing OFF!") if toggles.fasthunt then toggles.fasthunt = false echo("\nFasthunt OFF!") send(" ") else send(" ") end

Alias.name: gather
Alias.script: do_loot()

Alias.name: offer
Alias.script: offer_corpses()

Alias.name: load targets
Alias.script: possible_targets = {} target_type = "short" target_priority = 10000 for i in string.gmatch(matches[2], "(%w+)") do table.insert(possible_targets, i) end cecho("<green>Targets Received:") for h in ipairs(possible_targets) do cecho("\n "..possible_targets[h]) end send(" ")

Alias.name: generics
Alias.script: toggle("generics")

Alias.name: stop bashing after next kill
Alias.script: stopping_bashing = true cecho("<green>Bashing OFF after next kill!") if toggles.fasthunt then toggles.fasthunt = false echo("\nFasthunt OFF!") send(" ") else send(" ") end

Alias.name: direction
fishing mode
Alias.script: toggle("fishing")

Alias.name: bait type
distance
cut line
Alias.script: fishing.stat = "cutting"

Alias.name: Cast Line
Alias.script: send("fishing cast "..matches[2])

Alias.name: create window
Alias.script: window_start(matches[2])

Alias.name: hide window
Alias.script: window_hide(matches[2])

Alias.name: move window
Alias.script:
local dirstr = matches[3]:lower() local dirval = tonumber(matches[4])
window_move(matches[2], dirstr, dirval)

Alias.name: show window
Alias.script: window_show(matches[2])

Alias.name: reset window
Alias.script: window_reset(matches[2])

Alias.name: edit
Alias.script: window_edit(matches[2])

Alias.name: save
Alias.script: window_save(matches[2])

Alias.name: citytells
Alias.script: display(channels.citytells) send(" ")

Alias.name: ordertells
Alias.script: display(channels["ordertells"]) send(" ")

Alias.name: guildtells
Alias.script: display(channels.guildtells) send(" ")

Alias.name: markettells
Alias.script: display(channels.markettells) send(" ")

Alias.name: newbie tells
Alias.script: display(channels.newbietells) send(" ")

Alias.name: societytells
Alias.script: display(channels[current_society]) send(" ")

Alias.name: novice tells
Alias.script: display(channels.novicetells) send(" ")

Alias.name: credits for sale
Alias.script: send("credits for sale", false)

Alias.name: landmarks
Alias.script: if landmarks[matches[2]] ~= nil then send("path find "..landmarks[matches[2]], false) else cecho("<green>No such landmark!") send(" ") end

Alias.name: fleeing
Alias.script: if toggles.bashing then toggle("bashing") end if toggles.fasthunt then toggle("fasthunt") end if defenses.def_spellshield.needit then defenses.def_spellshield.needit = false echo("No longer keeping spellshield") send(" ") end set_attack("flee")

Alias.name: moving
Alias.script: if toggles.marching and my.class == "soldier" then send("march "..matches[1], false) elseif toggles.retreating and my.class == "soldier" then send("retreat "..matches[1], false) else send(matches[1], false) end

Alias.name: crit report
Alias.script: display(crits) send(" ")

Alias.name: target
Alias.script: targ = matches[2] target = matches[2] echo("Target: "..targ) send(" ") if id then killTrigger(id) end id = tempTrigger(targ, [[selectString("]] .. targ .. [[", 1) fg("DarkOrchid") resetFormat()]])

Alias.name: order guard move
Alias.script: for i = 1,tonumber(matches[2]) do send("order constable move "..matches[3]) end

Alias.name: testing
Alias.script: display(gmcp)

Alias.script: toggle("fasthunt")

toggles list
bashing commands
info
Alias.script:
cecho("
<blue>Welcome to Matawa 7.0!") cecho("
<green>Forum Thread:") cecho("
 http://www.midkemiaonline.com/forum/free-mudlet-system-0") send(" ")

Alias.name: setup
Alias.script: send("config voting on", false) send("config prompt all", false) send("config afflines on", false) send("config screenwidth off", false) send("config prompt remove verbose", false) send("config mxp on", false)

Alias.name: defense toggle
Alias.script: if not string.find(matches[2], "def_") then matches[2] = "def_"..matches[2] end if defenses[matches[2]].needit then defenses[matches[2]].needit = false echo("No longer keeping "..matches[2]) send(" ") else defenses[matches[2]].needit = true echo("Now keeping "..matches[2]) send(" ") end

Alias.name: defense options
Alias.script: load_def(matches[2])

Alias.name: diagnose
Alias.script: queue_diag()

Alias.script: send("focus body", false)

Alias.script: send("focus mind", false)

Alias.name: blessings
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then if matches[2] == "" then send("pray for glorious word", false) tempTimer(3.3, [[send("pray for radiant word", false)]] ) tempTimer(6.4, [[send("pray for illuminated word", false)]] ) tempTimer(9.6, [[send("pray for righteous word", false)]] ) tempTimer(12.79, [[send("pray for blessed word", false)]] ) else blessed = matches[2] send("pray for glorious word to "..blessed, false) tempTimer(3.3, [[send("pray for radiant word to "..blessed, false)]] ) tempTimer(6.4, [[send("pray for illuminated word to "..blessed, false)]] ) tempTimer(9.6, [[send("pray for righteous word to "..blessed, false)]] ) tempTimer(12.8, [[send("pray for blessed word to "..blessed, false)]] ) end end

Alias.name: full inferno
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then send("firecall inferno", false) tempTimer(4.1, [[send("firecall wildfire", false)]]) tempTimer(8.6, [[send("firecall heatwave", false)]]) tempTimer(14.3, [[send("firecall smokescreen on", false)]]) tempTimer(19.3, [[send("firecall ashfall", false)]]) tempTimer(23.5, [[send("firecall backdraft", false)]]) tempTimer(28.4, [[send("firecall firerain", false)]]) tempTimer(32.6, [[send("firecall fumes", false)]]) tempTimer(36.6, [[send("firecall heatstroke", false)]]) end

Alias.name: inferno
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then set_attack("firecall inferno") end

Alias.name: Greater Heal
Alias.script: if my.class == "priest" then if matches[2] == "" then set_attack("shadowcall greater heal") else set_attack("shadowcall greater heal " ..matches[2]) ally = matches[2] end need_heal = true end
